patterns.name: Smurfing (スマーフィング)
patterns.description_ja: 大きな取引を複数の小額取引に分割し、報告義務を回避する手法。多数の小額送金が短時間に実行される特徴がある。
patterns.description_en: A technique to split large transactions into multiple small transactions to avoid reporting requirements. Characterized by many small transfers executed in a short period.

rules.description: 取引額の変動係数が0.3未満（金額が類似）

indicators: Multiple small transactions to different addresses
Transactions occur within short time period
Destinations are new or low-activity addresses

patterns.name: Layering (レイヤリング)
patterns.description_ja: 資金源を隠蔽するため、複数の中間アドレスを経由して資金を移動させる手法。追跡を困難にすることを目的とする。
patterns.description_en: A technique to move funds through multiple intermediary addresses to obfuscate the source. Aimed at making tracking difficult.

rules.description: 中間アドレスの再利用なし

indicators: No address reuse in the chain
Final destination is unrelated to source

patterns.name: Mixing (ミキシング)
patterns.description_ja: Tornado CashやChipMixerなどのミキシングサービスを利用して資金の追跡を困難にする手法。
patterns.description_en: A technique using mixing services like Tornado Cash or ChipMixer to make fund tracking difficult.

rules.description: 既知のミキシングサービスとの取引

indicators: Direct interaction with known mixer contracts
Deposits to tornado.cash or similar services
Withdrawal from mixer to new address

patterns.name: Structuring (ストラクチャリング)
patterns.description_ja: 報告義務の閾値を下回るよう取引額を意図的に調整する手法。各国の規制を回避することが目的。
patterns.description_en: A technique to intentionally adjust transaction amounts to stay below reporting thresholds. Aimed at evading regulations.

rules.description: 報告閾値の90%に近い金額
1週間に3回以上のパターン繰り返し

indicators: Transaction amounts consistently just below thresholds
Multiple transactions to same or related addresses

patterns.name: Circular Trading (循環取引)
patterns.description_ja: 資金が元のアドレスに戻ってくる循環的な取引パターン。取引量を人為的に増やすウォッシュトレーディングの可能性がある。
patterns.description_en: Circular transaction patterns where funds return to the original address. Possible wash trading to artificially inflate volume.

rules.description: 資金が元のアドレスに戻る
サイクル長が3ホップ以上

indicators: No economic rationale for the pattern

patterns.name: Rapid Movement (急速移動)
patterns.description_ja: 資金を受け取った直後に別のアドレスへ転送する挙動。ホットウォレットや不正資金の可能性を示唆。
patterns.description_en: Behavior of transferring funds to another address immediately after receiving. Suggests hot wallet or illicit funds.
indicators: Funds moved within minutes of receipt

patterns.name: Dusting Attack (ダスティング攻撃)
patterns.description_ja: 極小額の暗号資産を大量のアドレスに送信し、ユーザーの行動を追跡する攻撃手法。
patterns.description_en: An attack technique sending tiny amounts of cryptocurrency to many addresses to track user behavior.

rules.description: 100以上の異なるアドレスへ送信

indicators: Tiny amounts sent to many addresses
Uniform or similar amounts across recipients
Sender has no prior interaction with recipients

patterns.name: Peel Chain (ピールチェーン)
patterns.description_ja: 大きな資金プールから少しずつ資金を剥ぎ取り、最終目的地へ送る手法。玉ねぎの皮を剥くように資金を分離。
patterns.description_en: A technique to gradually peel off funds from a large pool and send to final destination, like peeling an onion.

rules.description: 残高の一部を繰り返し送金

indicators: Each transaction peels off portion of balance
Typical of exchange withdrawals or fund distribution
